channel.title: [Added] Updates to the AidType and AidTypeCategory codelists
channel.description:
A [pull request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/143) has been received from @andylolz to bring the descriptions used in the [AidType](http://iatistandard.org/codelists/AidType/) and [AidTypeCategory](http://iatistandard.org/codelists/AidTypeCategory/) codelists in line with those published by the [OECD DAC](http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/dacandcrscodelists.htm).
This merely makes some small amendments to descriptions.

item.description:
This change to the codelists is now live on the website.

In light of this, I have updated the title of this post to [Added].
